overview: After divorcing her husband Kent, actress Anne Wetherall returns to the stage. Upon receiving a plea for help from childhood chum Nell Jerrold begging Anne to save Nell's daughter Betty from marrying Kent, the ex-Mrs. Wetherall decides to journey to the Jerrold's home in the town of Wheaton to investigate.
tagline: A Charming Story of a Noble Plot with a Nobler Counter Plot Establishing the Happiness of Two Lives
title: The Rescue
